I've been having trouble with the bindings for my steam controller.  It is supposed to switch bindings in game depending on situation, such as "flight", "editor", "map" and so on, but it falis to do so, and is always stuck on "menu".  

I am on the linux version, using SteamOS, and would like to know if there is a way to fix this.  Apparently there is a plugin for this that is automatically included with the steam version but I'm not sure if it works.
